long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to install SolitaireHelper Chrome extension and setting Chrome New Tab search provider to Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use -  https://solitairehelper.com/terms-and-conditions/

Welcome to SolitaireHelper, your gateway to endless Solitaire challenges right from your browser's homepage! Say goodbye to boredom and hello to mental stimulation with our intuitive Chrome extension. It also includes an easily accessible web search bar, for convenient internet searches.


You can find more about us here:
Privacy Policy - https://solitairehelper.com/privacy-policy/
